void.string: setenv RMATRIX_TYPE BGD setenv NEVENTS 400000000 setenv PRIOR_START 1 setenv PRIOR_STOP 6 setenv PRIOR_SKIP1 7 setenv PRIOR_SKIP2 7 setenv PRIOR_SKIP3 7 setenv RPARAM 0.3 setenv RM_PATH /gpfs01/star/pwg/licenrob/jets/pythiaRM setenv OUT_PATH /gpfs01/star/pwg/licenrob/jets/responseM_HT2/peripheral/rmatrix_normal/ROOformat setenv PYEMB_PATH /gpfs01/star/pwg/licenrob/jets/pythiaRM setenv PRIOR_PATH /gpfs01/star/pwg/licenrob/jets/responseM_HT2/prior setenv PTTHRESH 4 setenv CENTRALITY peripheral starver SL19c cd /gpfs01/star/pwg/licenrob/jets pwd root4star -l 'StRoot/macros/loadSharedHFLibraries.C' 'StRoot/macros/response_matrix/buildResponseROO.C' -q -b

# This loop solves the problem of not being able to use wild cards in the globus-url-copy command. # However the (toURL) area will need to be different for each pass of the loop as a destination file name must be specified. # In this syntax the user must put the last slash on the “toURL” or else it will concatenate the last dir to the file name. cd $SCRATCH foreach file ((fromScratch)) globus-url-copy -p 25 file:$SCRATCH/$file gsiftp://(copyBackGateKeeper)(toURL)$file end

########### Copy Command Block ###########
rm -f $SCRATCH/count.$JOBID.test (/bin/ls (fromScratch) > $SCRATCH/count.$JOBID.test) >& /dev/null if ( -z $SCRATCH/count.$JOBID.test ) then echo 'Error: Scheduler could not find any files in $SCRATCH matching your <output> tag fromScratch value: (fromScratchNoMode) ' else echo "Starting copy block" foreach file ( (fromScratch) ) set i=0
if ( -d $file ) then set cpCommand="/bin/cp -r $file (toURL)" else set cpCommand="/bin/cp -fp $file (toURL)" endif
RETRY_CP: echo "Running copy command: " $cpCommand $cpCommand if ( $status && $i < 15 ) then echo "The copy failed, waiting to try again." @ i++ sleep 60 echo "Trying copy again at "`/bin/date` goto RETRY_CP endif end
endif ##########################################

PeriodicRemove = (NumJobStarts >=1 && JobStatus==1) || (JobStatus == 2 && (CurrentTime - JobCurrentStartDate > (54000)) && ((RemoteUserCpu+RemoteSysCpu)/(CurrentTime-JobCurrentStartDate) < 0.10)) || (((CurrentTime - EnteredCurrentStatus) > (2*24*3600)) && JobStatus == 5) || (JobRunCount >= 1 && JobStatus == 1)

PeriodicRemove = (NumJobStarts >=1 && JobStatus==1) || (JobStatus == 2 && (CurrentTime - JobCurrentStartDate > (54000)) && ((RemoteUserCpu+RemoteSysCpu)/(CurrentTime-JobCurrentStartDate) < 0.10)) || (((CurrentTime - EnteredCurrentStatus) > (2*24*3600)) && JobStatus == 5) +IsRestartable = true
